==Examples==

{{{
X509Certificate ca = ...;
X509Certificate existing = ...;
URL url = new URL("http://www.example.org/scep/");
Proxy proxy = new Proxy(Proxy.Type.HTTP, new InetSocketAddress("proxy.example.org", 80));

X500Principal entity = new X500Principal("CN=www.example.org,O=Example,C=GB");
KeyPairGenerator gen = KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
KeyPair keyPair = gen.genKeyPair();

Requester client = new Requester(url, proxy);
client.initialize(ca);

client.setExistingCertificate(existing);
client.setCallbackHandler(handler);
client.enroll(entity, keyPair);
}}}
